Actions.Name: Add registrant
Actions.Description: Registers one person, identified by a unique email address, for a training.

Actions.Name: Get Registrant
Actions.Description: Retrieves details of a specific registrant in a training.

Actions.Name: Get training
Actions.Description: Retrieves all information about a scheduled training.

Actions.Name: List registrants
Actions.Description: Retrieves details of all registrants for a specific training.

Actions.Name: When a registrant is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a registrant is added to a training.

Actions.Name: When a training is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new training is created.
